CustomField.description: If this option is selected, the loan payment ACH job picks up payments for debiting the previous working day. For example, if a payment fell on a Sunday, the system would include it in Friday's ACH file.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this option is selected, the loan payment ACH job picks up payments for debiting the previous working day. For example, if a payment fell on a Sunday, the system would include it in Friday's ACH file. (Future Use)
CustomField.label: Debit Loan Pmt on Previous Working Day
